H0.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Tiplet

H1.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Lacecap

H2.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Cordstop

H3.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Agnet

A4.text: The stiff section at each end of the shoelace is called an aglet
